entities.name: ron
entities.description: Ron is described as the one who drinks the antidote. He is also referred to by name in the conversation between Harry and Slughorn.

entities.name: slughorn
entities.description: Slughorn is described as a professor who gives Ron an antidote. He is also referred to by name in the conversation between Harry and Slughorn.

entities.name: harry
entities.description: Harry is described as someone who watches Ron drink the antidote. He is also referred to by name in the conversation between Harry and Slughorn.

entities.name: dumbledore
entities.description: Dumbledore is mentioned as the one who was meant to receive a bottle of oak-matured mead from Slughorn.

relationships.description: Slughorn gives Ron an antidote, which is described as a 'tonic for the nerves'.
Harry watches Slughorn give Ron an antidote.
Slughorn mentions that he meant to give a bottle of oak-matured mead to Dumbledore.
